actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged in House.
Rereferred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans with service-connected disabilities rated as total to domestic and overseas travel on military aircraft on a space-available basis.

summary.text: Provides to veterans with a total service-connected disability the right to travel on a space-available basis on unscheduled military flights within the continental United States and on scheduled overseas flights operated by the Military Airlift Command.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans with service-connected disabilities rated as total to domestic and overseas travel on military aircraft on a space-available basis.
